page.title: 17LOCAL NEWS IN KINNEFF AREA
page.content: Most of the news about Kinneff appears in a local paper{" THE MEARNS LEADER". Over the last few months we have been mentioned several times. The people of Kinneff have been complaining that there is not enough parking space at the{Old Church}when there is a funeral there. It has been decided to enlarge the parking space but some people feel it should be even bigger. { Kinneff School}won the Rotary Shield in a project about an imaginary new leisure centre. Mrs.Gammie and two pupils were presented with a shield and a book token at a Rotary lunch at the St.Leonard's Hotel, Stonehaven. {The church}is often in the news. A local girl recently was married there. Another local boy, Martyn Sunter, took over as organist one Sunday because the usual organist had a cycling accident.
